data.quote: A ship in the harbor is safe. But that's not what ships are for.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: You have survived every single bad day so far
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Please pay attention very carefully, because this is the truest thing a stranger will ever say to you: In the face of such hopelessness as our eventual, unavoidable death, there is little sense in not at least TRYING to accomplish all your wildest dreams in life.
data.author: Kevin Smith

data.quote: At the age of 18, I made up my mind to never have another bad day in my life. I dove into a endless sea of gratitude from which I've never emerged.
data.author: Patch Adams

data.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote:
Look in the MIRROR...
That's your COMPETITION.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote:
BE STRONG
You never know who you are inspiring
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The greatest success stories were created by people who recognized a problem & turned it into an opportunity.
data.author: Joseph Sugarman

data.quote: I never wake up today with yesterday's problems.
data.author: Anthony Saleh

data.quote:
If you're going through hell,
KEEP GOING.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Fear stops people from accomplishing their goals.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The boundary between what can be and your life, is your ideas
data.author: Pat Waldron

data.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote:
There are three rules.
1. If you do not go after what you want, you will never have it.
2. If you do not ask, the answer will always be no.
3. If you do not step forward, you will remain in the same place.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small
data.author: Asim Premji

data.quote: There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them.
data.author: Charles D Gill

data.quote: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.
data.author: Dr. Suess

data.quote: It's never too late to be whoever you want to be. I hope you live a life you're proud of, And if you find that you're not, I hope you have the strength to start over.
data.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

data.quote: Just because you took longer than others, doesn’t mean you failed.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint', then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: One of the hardest decision you'll ever face in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder.
data.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

data.quote: Don't worry if people don't like you. Most people are struggling to like themselves.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Note to self: Keep going. You’re doing great. You might not be where you want to be yet, but that’s okay. Just take it one step at a time and keep believing in yourself. And remember: No matter what happens, you can still enjoy your life and be happy.
data.author: Lori Deschene
